summary:
Novi Global helps companies expand, develop, and grow beyond their borders. We also help candidates find their dream job. Why not ask me how we can work with you?

Positions worked:
Executive Search - VP, HR, MD, C-Level positions, CMO, CFO, COO, CEO
Oil & Gas - Reservoir Engineering, Petroleum Engineering, Drilling, Geoscience, Engineering
IT - Gaming, Embedded, Database, Software and Web Development, Support
Technology - Design, Hardware, Firmware
Sales & Marketing - Sales Manager, Marketing Manager, VP Marketing, CMO, Marketing Director
Construction - Railway Engineers, Bridge Designers, Tunnelling Specialists
Pet Nutrition - Regulatory Affairs, Food Science, Supply Chain

Industries placed in include:
Finance, Banking, FMCG, Electronics, Aerospace, Defence, Charity, Software, Hardware, Games, Petrochemical, O&G.

Countries placed in include:
UK, US, Canada, Mexico, Germany, Bulgaria, Norway, France, Ireland, South Africa, Bulgaria, Malaysia, Singapore, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Libya, Oman, Iraq, and Kuwait.

As CEO of Novi Global, it is my intention to develop a network of offices around the world, all of which will work collaboratively, making the company highly responsive to the needs of any client, whether local to each office, or when working with Fortune 500/FTSE companies. Novi Global works with some of the world's largest companies.

Novi Global recruits for many industries globally, from Entry-Level to Vice President and C-Level positions - CEO, CMO, CFO, COO.

Expertise includes:
- Headhunting
- Opportunity Creation
- Reverse Marketing
- C-Level Recruiter
- Senior Level Recruiter
- Business Development
- Wealth Creation
- Recruitment Process Outsourcing

Please contact me directly: chris.dewit@noviglobal.com for any queries and I will be happy to talk through our services in more detail or browse the jobs on our website: www.noviglobal.com

profile_positions.description:
Novi Global is a recruitment company, whose ethos is to provide global capabilities with a personalized service. Our specialty is Executive Search, headhunting the right candidates for our clients, in a professional, confidential, and discrete manner. We also have a strong track record in creating opportunities for Senior-level candidates.

We work in the Data Science, Cyber Security, Internet of Things, Blockchain, FinTech, Finance, Sales, Marketing, IT, Gaming, Oil & Gas, Hospitality, Healthcare, and Construction areas, and our Consultants, Partners, and Affiliates work in collaboration, very much as part of a team.

We have offices in Gibraltar, USA, Canada, UK, Ireland, Spain, Bulgaria, Romania, South Africa, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Zambia, Bahrain, UAE, Papua New Guinea, India, and Pakistan, and will soon be in Saudi Arabia and other countries in Africa and Asia. Through our Affiliates, our reach is global, with thousands of recruiters extending throughout the Americas, Africa, the Middle East, Europe, and Asia. 

Our services include retained, contract, and permanent recruitment, and we have supplied to many sectors, including RPA, Data Science, Cyber Security, FMCG, electronics, hospitality, FinTech, aerospace, defense, games, charity, software, hardware, petrochemical, refinery, geoscience and many more.

We work with candidates up to and including CEO, Chairman, CFO, CMO, COO, VP of Marketing, VP of Engineering, IT Director, Sales Director, and various other Vice Presidents and Senior Directors, with salaries ranging from $150,000 to $1 Million.

Please contact me directly: chris.dewit@noviglobal.com for any queries and I will be happy to talk through our services in more detail or browse the jobs on our website: www.noviglobal.com
